name: Kitemill AS
goal:
Kitemill is a turbine supplier which develops next generation wind turbines within the field Airborne Wind Energy.

Airborne Wind Energy will make wind power take a larger part of the global energy mix than otherwice possible. This is because Airborne Wind system allow haveresting of wind in higher altitude where the wind conditions are better everywhere, thus open up new larger geographical markets ealier not viable for wind power.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Humanitarian Aid, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Kitemill is currently following the process regarding EU Innovation Fund. While the Innovation Fund can in principle finance Airborne Wind Energy (AWE) projects already according to the current draft plans, since “Next generation wind turbines” are included as eligible technology, we would like to try to bring more emphasis on AWE as a key breakthrough renewable energy technology
